title: Psychedelic Drugs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/23/21
itunes:title: Psychedelic Drugs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/23/21
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and Dr. Andrew Gallimore discuss his research into the use of DMT and other psychedelic drugs as a way to open humans to communicate with advanced alien civilizations, and explore alternate universes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
